body:
Comment 7 by **esko.luontola**: 
I'm getting this same error with Go release.2010-03-04 when running the benchmarks 
(src/gospec/benchmarks_test.go) of http://github.com/orfjackal/gospec revision 
72cd04a0f83bbf3bdf217c0ca47706e772f76d1b using GOMAXPROCS=2 or greater.

It prints to stdout:

free 0x7f4de0228000: not an allocated block

And to stderr it prints:

throw: free mlookup

panic PC=0x7f4de0c02018
throw+0x3e /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:74
	throw(0x4982e5, 0x0)
free+0x9f /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/malloc.c:91
	free(0xe0228000, 0x7f4d)
addfinalizer+0x1ec /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/mfinal.c:138
	addfinalizer(0xdfe5e2a0, 0x7f4d, 0x446eeb, 0x0, 0x0, ...)
makechan+0x6d /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/chan.c:103
	makechan(0x490958, 0x0, 0x0, 0x7f4d)
runtime.makechan+0x24 /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/chan.c:157
	runtime.makechan(0x490958, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x40b298, ...)
container/list.*List路Iter+0x23 /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/container/list/list.go:190
	container/list.*List路Iter(0xdfe48380, 0x7f4d, 0x3, 0x3)
gospec.asSpecArray+0x5d /home/orfjackal/devel/gospec/src/gospec/specification.go:68
	gospec.asSpecArray(0xdfe48380, 0x7f4d, 0xdfe5c300, 0x7f4d)
gospec.*Runner路execute+0xdc /home/orfjackal/devel/gospec/src/gospec/runner.go:92
	gospec.*Runner路execute(0xe0df72c0, 0x7f4d, 0xe0c67580, 0x7f4d, 0x19, ...)
gospec._func_007+0x48 /home/orfjackal/devel/gospec/src/gospec/runner.go:70
	gospec._func_007(0xdfe3a870, 0x7f4d, 0xdfe3a878, 0x7f4d)
goexit /home/orfjackal/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:140
	goexit()

Full error log is here: http://pastebin.com/SpS6tWzx
